radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate-sized bilateral pleural effusions with adjacent lung base consolidation most consistent with atelectasis. Irregular fluid-density collection in the right lower quadrant has multiple components, the largest of which measures 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.3 cm. Mild cecal inflammation with moderate adjacent soft tissue stranding.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Non-organized fluid was present in a similar location on the prior exam, but there has been an interval increase in size and development of enhancing walls.
